definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: id.;—abs. [[מַתָָּת]] 1Ki 13:7; cstr. [[מַתַּת]] Pr 25:14 + 4 t.;—gift = reward 1Ki 13:7; [[מַתַּת יׇדוֹ]] the gift of his hand, i.e. of his power, what he is able to give Ez Eze 46:5, Eze 46:11 (cf. [[מַתָּנׇה]] and [[יׇד]]
); [[אֱלֽהִים]] ´[[מ]] Ec 3:13 the gift of God (of the enjoyment of man), so Ec 5:18; [[שָָׁקֶר]] ´[[מ]] Pr 25:14 a gift of falsity, i.e. one promised and not given.
